title: Nike Therma Men's Therma-FIT Tapered Fitness Pants (Black/Black/White, DQ5405-010)
description: Nike Therma-FIT technology helps manage your bodys natural heat to help keep you warm in cold-weather conditions.
Fleece feels supersoft and has a lightly fuzzy feel inside so you can stay warm and comfy.
Side pockets Zippered pocket at the back right hip
Inner drawcord with tipped ends Embroidered Swoosh graphic

Your workouts don't stop when the cool weather begins, so we added supersoft fleece to our Therma Pants. Designed to keep you feeling warm and comfortable wherever you exercise, their relaxed and tapered fit gives you plenty of room to stretch and squat without losing any range of motion.
